Interface HierarchicalChartModel<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the node used in the hierarchy.
All Superinterfaces:
ChartModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultHierarchicalChartModel
public interface HierarchicalChartModel<T> extends ChartModel
An extension of ChartModel for hierarchical data structures, such as those required by Sunburst or Treemap charts.
Since:
2024-06-01
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
